TextView.android:text: For university students, having a safe, comfortable place to live is an essential part of being able to focus and do good work in school. In Moi University the demand for accommodation increases every year and the University is under continuous pressure to find suitable accommodation.

The on-campus residences are unable to cope with the demand and the University has to make use of private accommodation in and around our campus to supplement accommodation offered by the university. Reports from Hostels and Estate management department indicates that more than 5000 students miss out on accommodation spaces annually in Main Campus.
Due to lack of accommodation spaces most students have been forced to look for non-residence apartments elsewhere.

Moi University being a community encompassing of the students, staff, business community and the locals, the need for housing is much paramount. It is appreciable to note that Moi University has implemented the Hostel management system to increase the efficiency and convenience of booking into university hostels. It was in line with this thought that we decided to come up with a parallel system that will help non-resident students find a room.
